Interface UserService

    public interface UserService
    Interface for operations with User

      • createUser

        User createUser​(BaseUserDto baseUserDto)
         throws DataValidityException,
                InternalException,
                DataExistsException
        Creates db user from dto
        Parameters:
        baseUserDto - New user's data
        Returns:
        User to save in db
        Throws:
        DataExistsException - if user already exists
        DataValidityException - if user data is not valid
        InternalException - if internal exception occurred
